1.0.1.name: wordpress/jigoshop-statistics
1.0.1.description:
Statistics are massively important, that's why I've created JigoShop Statistics. This plugin will allow you to see:

  • Lifetime Sales
  • Sales this month
  • Average order value
  • Total number of sales
  • Bestsellers

Follow me on Twitter to keep up with the latest updates @jamesckemp
